titleStmt.title: The chaplains petition to the Honourable House for redress of grievances. By one of the camp chaplains
titleStmt.author: One of the camp chaplains.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the use of the petitioners; and sold by Tho. Ranew in Fleet-Street near Temple Barr,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
